entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
